alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 5:25PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 600 PM EST... At 525 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud over Pine Island Ridge, or over Davie, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Davie, Plantation, Lauderhill, Dania Beach, Cooper City, Wilton Manors, Lazy Lake, Royal Palm Ranches, Ravenswood Estates, St. George, Sunshine Acres, Estates Of Fort Lauderdale, Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood International Airport, Chambers Estates, Pine Island Ridge, Downtown Fort Lauderdale, Broadview Park, and Franklin Park. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Metro Broward County
